mapper.sql: id, oms_id, outstock_no, external_no, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliver_id, deliver_name, chyun_code, chyun_name, waybill_no, unpacking, send_time, temperature_type_code, temperature_type_name, bill_type_code, bill_type_name, b2b_flag, total_weight, resize_weight,resize_num, total_quantity, total_varieties, split_single, is_calculated, fees_no, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time,calculate_time, del_flag,product_detail, extattr1, extattr2, extattr3, extattr4, extattr5,boxnum,adjust_boxnum

if.test: (billTypeName != null and billTypeName !='' and billTypeNameOther == null )

mapper.select:
select
from biz_outstock_master a where del_flag = 0

select a.id, a.customer_name, a.warehouse_name, a.external_no, a.outstock_no, a.waybill_no, a.fees_no, a.bill_type_name, a.creator, a.create_time, a.carrier_name, a.deliver_name, a.temperature_type_name, a.b2b_flag, a.total_quantity, a.total_varieties, a.boxnum, a.total_weight, a.resize_num, a.resize_varieties, a.adjust_boxnum, a.resize_weight, a.product_detail, b.subject_code, b.is_calculated, b.calcu_msg, b.calculate_time, b.unit,b.cost from biz_outstock_master a LEFT JOIN fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no=b.fees_no where a.del_flag='0' and b.del_flag='0'
and b.subject_code = #{subjectCode}
mapper.insert:
insert into biz_outstock_master(oms_id, outstock_no, external_no, warehouse_code, warehouse_name, customerid, customer_name, carrier_id, carrier_name, deliver_id, deliver_name, chyun_code, chyun_name, waybill_no, unpacking, send_time, temperature_type_code, temperature_type_name, bill_type_code, bill_type_name, b2b_flag, total_weight, resize_weight, total_quantity, total_varieties, split_single, is_calculated, fees_no, remark, creator, create_time, last_modifier, last_modify_time,write_time, calculate_time, del_flag) values (
#{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outstockNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{externalNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chyunCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chyunName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waybillNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unpacking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{temperatureTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperatureTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b2bFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{resizeWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalQuantity,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalVarieties,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{splitSingle,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isCalculated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{writeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{calculateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select a.waybill_no from biz_outstock_master a inner join fees_receive_storage b on a.fees_no = b.fees_no inner join fees_bill c on b.bill_no = c.billno and c.delflag = 0 where a.del_flag = 0
LIMIT 1

select a.waybill_no from biz_outstock_master a where a.del_flag = 0 and a.is_calculated = 1
LIMIT 1
mapper.update: update biz_outstock_master a set a.is_calculated = 99 where a.del_flag = 0
